Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits employers from engaging in discrimination on the basis of a protected class when using artificial intelligence in certain employment practices
Summary: Prohibits employers from engaging in discrimination on the basis of a protected class when using artificial intelligence for recruitment, hiring, promotion, renewal of employment, selection for training or apprenticeship, discharge, discipline, tenure, or the terms, privileges, or conditions of employment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting employers from engaging in discrimination on the basis of a protected class when using artificial intelligence in certain employment practices
